nodes.text: Jevek was a male Cathar who served in the Galactic Republic's army as a corporal during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. During the war he was stationed on the planet Corellia where worked as a heavy armor merchant and ran a stall within the Republic controlled Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport. Jevek had brown hair and skin and yellow eyes. While at his stall he wore white armor with blue markings.

Corporal Jevek appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Heavy Armor Vendor for Republic players on Corellia. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Jevek was removed from the game along with the rest of the Heavy Armor Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
